about.summary: Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' developer tools services, including version control, continuous integration and deployment, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/products/developer-tools/>.
Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' developer tools services, including version control, continuous integration and deployment, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/products/developer-tools/>.

name: r-paws.developer.tools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-paws.developer.tools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/paws.developer.tools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/paws.developer.tools/paws.developer.tools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9722bb9e3347edd392429ccfdbb6bc764b72a0e98177f3a55ed20dbf2e704dac

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-paws.common >=0.8.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-paws.common >=0.8.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('paws.developer.tools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('paws.developer.tools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/paws-r/paws
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' developer tools services, including version control, continuous integration and deployment, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/products/developer-tools/>.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: paws.developer.tools

# Authors@R: c(person(given = "David", family = "Kretch", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "david.kretch@gmail.com"), person(given = "Adam", family = "Banker", role = "aut", email = "adam.banker39@gmail.com"), person(given = "Amazon.com, Inc.", role = "cph"))
